preferences.accommodation: Mix of hotels and home stays
preferences.interests: Food, cute shops (潮玩), indie bookstores (English), small cafes, unique local experiences
preferences.special_notes: Girlfriend jet-lagged on Day 1, avoid Wed/Thu for day trips in Beijing

user_plans: Arrive 4:40am at Chongqing Jiangbei T3 (HU718 from Paris CDG T1)
Store luggage at Raffles Hotel, visit observation deck
Breakfast at Raffles after observation deck
Visit Huguang Guild Hall (湖广会馆)
Afternoon: Xiayuan Li (下浩里) and Longmenhao (龙门浩)
Visit Xiyue Box (熹玥盒子) in Xiayuan Li
Optional: Liziba Station (李子坝) or Hongya Cave (洪崖洞)
Evening: Hotpot on Nanshan hillside with Chongqing night view (NOT riverside)
Check-in: Raffles Hotel Chongqing (来福士洲际酒店)
Early morning 7am high-speed train from Chongqing to Bazhong
Afternoon: Spend time with family at home (半山逸城A区35幢1902)
Evening: Celebrate Chinese New Year with family
Morning: Breakfast at 老五酱肉包子 (most authentic Bazhong breakfast)
Pack and say goodbye to family
Visit local scenic/historical spot: Nankang Slope (南龛坡) or Wangwang Mountain (望王山)
Lunch: 老七牛肉 (must-have Bazhong specialty)
High-speed train to Chengdu after lunch
Arrive Chengdu home: 西锦国际二期四幢四单元1902, Huapaifang North Street 99号
9am: Visit Chengdu Panda Base, stay 1 hour
Must cover all 3 restaurants: Mingting Restaurant (明婷饭店), Niu Chengcheng wagyu (牛丞丞), Taolin (饕林)
Afternoon flight CA4509 from Chengdu Shuangliu 14:35 to Shanghai Pudong T2 17:20
Check-in: SK Luxury Hotel Houxi (南京路步行街店), The Bund area
Michelin-recommended local restaurant Ren He Guan (人和馆) for Shanghai cuisine
Niche boutiques, indie bookstores (English), small cafes
Cute toy/collectible shops (like Pop Mart style)
Morning flight MU5129 Shanghai Pudong T1 9:05 to Beijing Daxing 11:25
Evening: Watch dance performance 'Only This Green' (只此青绿)
Check-in: Orange Hotel Beijing Zhongguancun Xueyuan Bridge (桔子酒店中关村学院桥店)
Help establish student life comfort zone: tour Tsinghua/Peking University, find nearby food and amenities
Explore local area, settle into rental
Flexible day trip or city exploration

accommodation: Feb 15: Raffles Hotel Chongqing (来福士洲际酒店)
Feb 16: Family home Bazhong (半山逸城A区35幢1902)
Feb 17-18: Chengdu home (西锦国际二期四幢四单元1902, 花牌坊北街99号)
Feb 18-21: SK Luxury Hotel Houxi, Shanghai Bund (南京路步行街店)
Feb 22: Orange Hotel Beijing Zhongguancun (桔子酒店)

must_do_activities: Chongqing: Hotpot on Nanshan hillside with city view, Longmenhao area
Bazhong: 老五酱肉包子 breakfast, 老七牛肉 lunch, family time
Chengdu: Panda Base, Jinli, Mingting Restaurant, Niu Chengcheng, Taolin
Shanghai: The Bund, Disneyland, Ren He Guan, Michelin dining, Ajiya yakiniku
Beijing: Forbidden City, couple photography, dance studio registration, Tsinghua/PKU tour, 只此青绿 performance
wishlist: Chongqing: Fancy massage near hotel, niche fancy spots foreigners love
Shanghai: Pudong Art Museum, niche INFJ-friendly spots
Beijing: Nanluoguxiang, 798, Tianjin day trip, indie bookstores, cute toy shops
constraints: Beijing Tue/Wed/Thu: No far day trips (evening activities OK)
No interest in historical buildings with stories
Prefer cute, niche, fancy places over mainstream tourist spots
